History
-------
0.2.5 (2018-01-25)
---------------------
* Bugfixes
* New feature: delete student accounts

---------------------
* Bugfixes
* Enforce alpha version of github3

0.2.3 (2016-10-14)
---------------------
* Bugfixes

0.2.2 (2016-10-14)
---------------------

* Support extra file for external deductions
* Summarize grades by student/test/etc.

0.1.8 (2016-01-16)
---------------------

* First fully functional version

0.1.0 (2016-01-01)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
